short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens ChatGPT with selected text and inputs it into the prompt box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌐 Easily access ChatGPT by simply Right Clicking Selected Text

Effortlessly open ChatGPT with selected text from any webpage for quick responses, summaries, translations, or creative ideas.

✅ Simple, Free, and Privacy-Focused
This lightweight browser extension is designed to boost productivity while respecting user privacy. It’s completely free and does not track or store any user data.

✨ Key Features:
💬 Open ChatGPT with Selected Text: Right-click on any selected text and instantly open ChatGPT with the text pre-filled.
📝 Quick Summaries and Translations: Get text summaries or translations directly within the browser, improving workflow efficiency.
🔒 No Data Collection: The extension is privacy-focused and does not store, collect, or share any user data.
🚀 Easy to Use: Just right-click to open ChatGPT on any webpage—no additional setup or switching between tools.
💯 100% Free
No hidden fees, subscriptions, or restrictions—use it freely across any website.


🛠️ How It Works:
🖱️ Right-click Context Menu: After selecting text on any webpage, "Open ChatGPT with Selected text" Option and it opens ChatGPT with the selected text pre-filled.
🔑 Minimal Permissions: The extension uses minimal permissions, ensuring a secure and privacy-respecting experience.
📬 Support and Feedback
For any support, bug reports, or feature requests, feel free to contact arnavprak@gmail.com. We appreciate your feedback to continuously improve the extension.
